alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Mercer; Monroe; Summers; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 11:06AM EST until February 28 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest North Carolina, central, south central, southwest and west central Virginia and southeast West Virginia. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and scattered power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevations above 2500 ft will experience the highest wind gusts, which are expected to occur in the time frame of 8 PM EST this evening to 6 AM EST Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greenbrier; Mercer; Monroe; Summers; Western Greenbrier
